update

public void update(java.lang.String history,
                   java.lang.String symbol,
                   boolean use_seed,
                   boolean use_feedback)
updates VOMM according to a history and the symbol appearing afterwards

Parameters:
history - String of chars appearing before symbol
symbol - String that appears after history
use_seed - boolean if Class seed should be used
use_feedback - boolean if class generated history should be used

Parameters:

Returns:

sample

public java.lang.String sample(double modularity,
                               boolean keep_history)
Samples Symbol from probabilities of Symbols appearing after empty sequence

Parameters:
modularity - value between 1-0 to decide the modularity of the probabilities
keep_history - boolean if sampled String should be added to generated history
Returns:
Symbol sampled from the probability distribution following an empty seed

sample

public java.lang.String sample(java.lang.String seed,
                               double modularity,
                               int max_order,
                               boolean use_seed,
                               boolean use_feedback,
                               boolean keep_history)
Returns one character sampling from probabilities of Symbols appearing after context

Parameters:
seed - Seed used to sample next symbol
modularity - value between 1-0 to decide the modularity of the probabilities
max_order - int Maximal order of VOMM that should be used
use_seed - boolean if true internal seed is used
use_feedback - boolean if true will use whole history not just seed to sample
keep_history - boolean if true adds sample to this.generated_history
Returns:
Sampled Symbol

sample_fuzzy

public java.lang.String sample_fuzzy(java.lang.String seed,
                                     int distance,
                                     double modularity,
                                     int max_order,
                                     boolean use_seed,
                                     boolean use_feedback,
                                     boolean keep_history)
Sampling Symbol from the mean probability distribution described by similar contexts to input(Similarity-Measure = Hamming-Distance)

Parameters:
seed - String context to get the similar contexts of *
distance - Sets the amount of Hamming-distance
modularity - value between 1-0 to decide the modularity of the probabilities
use_seed - boolean if true internal seed is used
use_feedback - boolean if true will use whole history not just seed to sample
keep_history - boolean if true adds sample to this.generated_history
Returns:
Sampled symbol
